descript.abstract: Streets data includes: Arterial Classification, Street Names, Block Number, Direction, One-way, Surface Width, Surface Type, Pavement Condition, Speed Limit, Percent Slope. From the Hansen Asset Management System:The linework is from the SND(Street Network Database) which can be found at our open data site - https://data-seattlecitygis.opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/street-network-database-snd. | Attribute Information: https://www.seattle.gov/Documents/Departments/SDOT/GIS/Seattle_Streets_OD.pdf | Update Cycle: Weekly| Contact Email: DOT_IT_GIS@seattle.gov--- Common SDOT queries and data downloads | Arterial Classification: of Seattle StreetsARTCLASS IN(1,2,3,4)| Transit Classification: of Seattle StreetsTRANCLASS IN(1,2,3,4,5,6)
descript.purpose: SDOT maintained data about streets in Seattle.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
